ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by those that speedily glide along (the cosmos),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the angels who float (in the heavens by the will of God),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And by those who float in space,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and by [the clouds] that swim serenely and
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the angels who glide swimmingiy,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And by those who glide along (on errands of mercy),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by those that swim along (i.e. angels or planets in their orbits, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:3] by those that glide serenely, [by] the angels who descend from the heavens with His command, exalted be He;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By the lone stars floating) and it is also said that He is here swearing by the angels who take away the souls of the righteous slowly and gently and then let them rest; it is also said this refers to the souls of the believers,
